import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-form', templateUrl: './contact-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-form.component.scss'] }) export class ContactFormComponent { }
How can we help?

Complete the form to enable button.

Form Value: {{ contactForm.value | json }}

Form Status: {{ contactForm.status }}
